main.name: Ayush Kumar Shaw
main.description: Back-end Java developer, currently exploring React. #liveToCode
main.bio: A. K. Shaw, having his roots in Java development, is immensely interested in the vast domains of software engineering and coding in general. Capable of writing APIs with industry best practices like JUnit, Mockito, MVCS layering, etc., he is not limited by his knowledge, rather he feels it needful to keep learning to stay up in his game. Shaw will be more than happy to contribute, for it'll help him grow. Hence the guy is always looking forward to creating a meaningful impact.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: To mention a few, but not limited to.

education.degree: Bachelors in Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Student Developer
work.description: During the apprenticeship, made contributions to these projects: a secure file-sharing service, a visual stock portfolio analyzer, and an online IDE.

projects.title: Code Player
projects.category: An online editor to get the output of HTML/CSS/JavaScript code.

testimonials.text: Ayush has been a really good friend and a code mentor of mine. He has helped me to see through code effectively.
